text: Peter Christensen (25 April 1975 – 6 February 2025) was a Danish politician. He represented Venstre. He was a member of Parliament from 2001 to 2015. He was Chairman of Venstres Ungdom from 1999 to 2001. He was the Minister of Defence from 2015 to 2016. Christensen died on 6 February 2025 in Copenhagen, Denmark from cancer, aged 49.Tidligere minister Peter Christensen er død ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Denmark Category:Politicians from Copenhagen
title: Peter Christensen
